history.content:
You are a helpful assistant that answers questions based on conversation history.
Given a question, provide a clear and accurate answer based on the information from the conversations.

Where did Caroline move from 4 years ago?

Here are some examples of the task you have completed:

Question: How long ago was Caroline's 18th birthday?
Assistant: Based on the conversation, **Caroline's 18th birthday was ten years ago**. This is mentioned when she talks about the hand-painted bowl she received as a gift from a friend for her 18th birthday.


Question: When did Caroline give a speech at a school?
Assistant: Based on the conversation, there is no specific mention of Caroline giving a speech at a school. However, she did talk about an event she participated in at a school last week, where she shared her transgender journey and encouraged students to get involved in the LGBTQ community. Therefore, Caroline gave a speech at a school **last week**.


Question: 'Caroline': 'Hey Melanie! Long time no talk! A lot's been going on in my life! Take a look at this.'
Assistant: 'Melanie': 'Hey, Caroline! Nice to hear from you! Love the necklace, any special meaning to it?'
User: 'Caroline': 'Thanks, Melanie! This necklace is super special to me - a gift from my grandma in my home country, Sweden. She gave it to me when I was young, and it stands for love, faith and strength. It's like a reminder of my roots and all the love and support I get from my family.'
Assistant: 'Melanie': 'That's gorgeous, Caroline! It's awesome what items can mean so much to us, right? Got any other objects that you treasure, like that necklace?'
User: 'Caroline': 'Yep, Melanie! I've got some other stuff with sentimental value, like my hand-painted bowl. A friend made it for my 18th birthday ten years ago. The pattern and colors are awesome-- it reminds me of art and self-expression.'
Assistant: 'Melanie': 'That sounds great, Caroline! It's awesome having stuff around that make us think of good connections and times. Actually, I just took my fam camping in the mountains last week - it was a really nice time together!'
User: 'Caroline': 'Sounds great, Mel. Glad you made some new family mems. How was it? Anything fun?'
Assistant: 'Melanie': 'It was an awesome time, Caroline! We explored nature, roasted marshmallows around the campfire and even went on a hike. The view from the top was amazing! The 2 younger kids love nature. It was so special having these moments together as a family - I'll never forget it!'
User: 'Caroline': 'That's awesome, Melanie! Family moments like that are so special. Glad y'all had such a great time.'
Assistant: 'Melanie': 'Thanks, Caroline! Family time matters to me. What's up with you lately?'
User: 'Caroline': 'Lately, I've been looking into counseling and mental health as a career. I want to help people who have gone through the same things as me.'
Assistant: 'Melanie': 'Sounds great! What kind of counseling and mental health services do you want to persue?'
User: 'Caroline': 'I'm still figuring out the details, but I'm thinking of working with trans people, helping them accept themselves and supporting their mental health. Last Friday, I went to an LGBTQ+ counseling workshop and it was really enlightening. They talked about different therapeutic methods and how to best work with trans people. Seeing how passionate these pros were about making a safe space for people like me was amazing.'
Assistant: 'Melanie': 'Woah, Caroline, it sounds like you're doing some impressive work. It's inspiring to see your dedication to helping others. What motivated you to pursue counseling?'
User: 'Caroline': 'Thanks, Melanie. It really mattered. My own journey and the support I got made a huge difference. Now I want to help people go through it too. I saw how counseling and support groups improved my life, so I started caring more about mental health and understanding myself. Now I'm passionate about creating a safe, inviting place for people to grow.'
Assistant: 'Melanie': 'Wow, Caroline! You've gained so much from your own experience. Your passion and hard work to help others is awesome. Keep it up, you're making a big impact!'
User: 'Caroline': 'Thanks, Melanie! Your kind words mean a lot.'
Assistant: 'Melanie': 'Congrats Caroline! Good on you for going after what you really care about.'


Question: What is Caroline's relationship status?
